resources:
My Assets FAQ Change Derivation Path Change Address Type Please select the derivation path that you would like to use for Ethereum. The first 3 accounts (addresses) are displayed for each path. This path is the most common one that many software wallets use to generate addresses. Some examples include MetaMask, Rabby, BitKeep & Core Wallet.
